title: EMCO 100 logo
content:
what typeface do they use?  
any help would be greatly appreciated.

 [‹ Fort Minor sessions @ AOL tech sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013184414/http:/typophile.com/node/19485 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ung 06/07 Young Swedish Design - Dynamo Bold {Patricia, Brown Fox (self)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013184414/http:/typophile.com/node/19478 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Kenny Bania

comments.content: EMCO is most probably custom designed. It’s not very good, so I doubt this is a professional font.
